title: London bike-riding thugs punch and kick a man to the ground as onlookers film it but don't intervene
text:
This is the shocking moment a gang of bike-riding thugs throw a man to the ground and repeatedly beat him on a London street.

The three-strong mob pounce on the victim and they wrestle on the pavement after it was claimed a bike was damaged.

The youths start stomping and kicking him on the floor as a woman can be heard screaming at the group.

The three-strong mob pounce on the man and they wrestle on the pavement after it was claimed a bike was damaged

But the victim quickly rolls back on to his feet as the brawlers face off against each other.

As the fight continues, one onlooker can be overheard saying: 'That's not my instinct, my instinct is the opposite. Lets smoke a cigarette and watch.'

The vicious attack took place near Camden Town Underground station on Kentish Town Road in the early hours of Saturday.

The youths start stomping and kicking him on the ground (pictured) as a woman can be heard screaming at the group

The vicious attack took place near Camden Town Underground station on Kentish Town Road (pictured) in the early hours of Saturday

Witnesses can be heard joking the fight is 'free TV', but social media users criticised them for not trying to break up the scrap.

The onlookers say in the clip: 'A proper little Camden bust up,' while another adds: 'It's free TV..'

The footage was uploaded to Twitter by the 'London Knife Crime LDN' with the caption: 'Kids riding though in Camden on Friday night at 2am, started a fight with bystanders.'

Witnesses can be heard joking the fight is 'free TV', but social media users criticised them for not trying to break up the scrap

After also appearing on Facebook, the video sparked outrage among people in the comments over the onlookers who stood and watched.

One person wrote: 'Did the person filming bother to phone the police?'

Kat Adams posted: 'And yet nobody helping.'

A Metropolitan Police spokesman said no reports of the incident were made and there have been no subsequent arrests.
description: The group of three thugs wrestle a man to the ground outside Camden Town underground on Kentish Town Road, north London, in the early hours of Saturday.
